en: They struggled against the dictator.

en: They advanced on the enemy.

en: They make up about 12.5 percent of the total population.

en: They are artists.

en: They are singers.

en: They drink coke.

en: Their divorce is much talked about in their neighborhood.

en: You mustn't give in to their demands.

en: Don't give way to their request.

en: Their friendship ripened into a deep love.

en: Their eyes pursued him.

en: Their names escaped me.

en: I couldn't remember their names.

en: Their dreams came true.

en: Their farms adjoin.

en: Their patience was about to give out.

en: Their efforts were not for nothing.

en: The report proved true as a result of their investigation.

en: Some of them are healthy, but some of them aren't.

en: Some of them are healthy, but others are not healthy.

en: Who is their homeroom teacher?

en: They were mostly women.

en: Their lifestyle is different to ours.

en: Their curiosity was aroused.

en: They heard a noise behind them.

en: Their employees live in.

en: You'd better do what they say.

en: Their excuses were all alike.

en: It is not clearly stated in their study if the patients overcame this syndrome during the therapy.

en: Their blood will be distributed to many people.

en: Their expenses for the wedding were considerable.

en: Their plan sounds interesting to me.

en: Their decision will bring about serious consequences.

en: I am quite ignorant of their plan.

en: I don't know anything about their plan.

en: Their plan resulted in failure.

en: I do not think their plan will work out.

en: I don't think their plan will work out.
zh: 我认为他们的计划行不通。

en: I don't think their plan will work.
zh: 我认为他们的计划行不通。

en: I don't think that their plan will work.

en: Their muscles are stiff.

en: There is a generation gap between them.

zh: 他们用石头建造房屋。

en: Their house is off the map, miles away from the nearest town.
zh: 他们的房子位置偏僻，离最近的城镇也有好几英里。

en: Theirs is an old family.
zh: 他们是历史悠久的家族。

en: Their house is far from the station.
zh: 他们的房子离车站很远。

en: Their house is being remodeled.
zh: 他们的房子正在改造。

en: Their house was burned down in the fire.
zh: 他们的房子在火灾中被烧毁了。

en: Their dining room is very spacious.
zh: 他们的餐厅非常宽敞。

en: They were very kind to me when I was at their house.
zh: 我在他们家的时候，他们对我很好。

en: Some of them are my friends.
zh: 他们中的一些人是我的朋友。

en: Some of them said yes, and the others said no.
zh: 他们中一些人同意了，另一些人拒绝了。

en: The warmth of their welcome made me happy.
zh: 他们热情的欢迎让我感到高兴。

en: It took us a week to locate their hideaway.
zh: 我们花了一个星期才找到他们的藏身之处。

en: It took one week to locate their hiding place.
zh: 我们花了一个星期才找到他们的藏身之处。

en: Their opinions differ from mine.
zh: 他们的意见和我的不同。

en: Their opinion matters little.
zh: 他们的意见无关紧要。

en: Each of their opinions has both good points and bad points.
zh: 他们的每个意见都有优点和缺点。

en: Even after being approved, difficulties might arise in the actual construction of the line.
zh: 即使获得批准，线路的实际建设中也可能会出现困难。

en: It is your business to take care of them.
zh: 照顾他们是你的事。

en: They are mostly polite.
zh: 他们大多很有礼貌。

en: I guess most of them went home.
zh: 我猜他们大多数人都回家了。

en: I think most of them took part in the plot.
zh: 我认为他们大多数人都参与了阴谋。

en: Shall I carry coffee to them?
zh: 要我给他们送咖啡吗？

en: Their boat needs painting.
zh: 他们的船需要油漆。
